text: Cng klaw theid muhammad"phwk than mi hen dxk hrux? Brrda phakhi (cewd) khxng phwk than thi phwk than wingwxn khx xun ca kxallxhˌ cng sædng hı chan hen si wa phwk man di srang xari nı phændin ni ? Hrux wa phwk man mi swn rwm nı chan fa thanghlay? " Hrux wa rea di hı khamphir kæ phwk man phwk man cung yud man xyu bn hlakthan cak man pela dxk! Brrda phu xthrrm nan tang k midi mi sayya xari tx kan nxkcak kar hlxklwng theanan
